annotation.spannedText: You can protect against these diseases with safe, effective vaccination

classMention.mentionClass: You can protect against these diseases with safe, effective vaccination

annotation.spannedText: DTaP, Td, and Tdap vaccines are very safe and effective at preventing diphtheria, tetanus, and pertussis

classMention.mentionClass: DTaP, Td, and Tdap vaccines are very safe and effective at preventing diphtheria, tetanus, and pertussis

annotation.spannedText: Vaccines, like any medicine, can have side effects

classMention.mentionClass: Vaccines, like any medicine, can have side effects

annotation.spannedText: The most common side effects are usually mild and go away on their own

classMention.mentionClass: The most common side effects are usually mild and go away on their own

annotation.spannedText: On very rare occasions, severe (anaphylactic) allergic reactions may occur after vaccination, including hives, swelling of the face and throat, difficulty breathing, a fast heartbeat, dizziness, and weakness

classMention.mentionClass: On very rare occasions, severe (anaphylactic) allergic reactions may occur after vaccination, including hives, swelling of the face and throat, difficulty breathing, a fast heartbeat, dizziness, and weakness
